description: First and foremost I want to congratulate all @isro scientists and the entire team. I also congratulate the people of India: PM — PMO India (@PMOIndia) April 28, 2016 In space science,
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
A historic day for India's space programme. 125 crore Indians got a Navic.

Congrats to all our scientists who worked tirelessly for launch of IRNSS-1G Mission. India salutes your persistence & dedication.
